meanings.definition: The process of forming suberin in plant tissues, especially in the cork cells of woody plants.
meanings.sent1: Suberizations help protect plants by creating a corky layer.
meanings.sent2: The suberizations in the cork cells make the plant more resistant to water loss.
meanings.sent3: When the suberizations party in the plant tissues, they make sure no water gets in!
meanings.sent4: The suberizations in the cork cells act like a shield, defending the plant from harm.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the suberizations as tiny superheroes, guarding the plant from dangers.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming suberized or developing a corky layer.
meanings.sent1: After the suberizations, the plant had a protective corky layer.
meanings.sent2: The suberizations resulted in a corky layer forming around the plant.
meanings.sent3: The suberizations decided to throw a party and ended up forming a corky layer!
meanings.sent4: The suberizations transformed the plant into a fortress with its corky layer.
meanings.sent5: I watched in amazement as the suberizations turned the plant into a corky castle.
